titles.title: Sensible, Timely Relief for America's Nuclear Districts' Economic Development Act of 2017
Sensible, Timely Relief for America's Nuclear Districts' Economic Development Act of 2017
STRANDED Act of 2017
STRANDED Act of 2017
To assist communities affected by stranded nuclear waste, and for other purposes.
STRANDED Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
